short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate the average grade in Portal2

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will add cumulated ECTS and the average grade to the bottom of the marks list in Uni Mannheim Portal2 (Mein Studium -> PrÃ¼fungsverwaltung -> Notenspiegel)

This extension is fully open-source:
